## Data inspection {-}

```{r new libraries}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(copopa)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r inspection}

# Add file as data
covid <- read_csv("files/covid_daily_data/data.csv")

# Check column names and amount of columns
colnames(covid) # There are 12 columns

# Inspect data
covid %>% count(countriesAndTerritories) # 214 countries participate
n_distinct(covid$geoId) # Each country has an unique geoId, so there are no double countries
unique(covid$continentExp) # All countries are located in Asia, Europe, Africa, America, Oceania or Other
mima(covid$dateRep) # First data was noted on 01/01/2020, last data was noted on 31/12/2019.

```

```{r cases graph}
covid_cases <- covid %>% select(countriesAndTerritories, cases, year, month)
covid_cases_nl <- covid_cases %>% filter(countriesAndTerritories == "Netherlands",
                                   year == "2020",
                                   month == 2:12)

ggplot(covid_cases_nl, aes(x=month, y=cases))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  labs(title = "Daily covid cases in the Netherlands that occured in 2020",
       x = "Months",
       y = "Cases")+
  theme_minimal()

```

```{r deaths graph}

covid_deaths <- covid %>% select(countriesAndTerritories, deaths, year, month)
covid_deaths_nl <- covid_deaths %>% filter(countriesAndTerritories == "Netherlands",
                                   year == "2020",
                                   month == 2:12)

ggplot(covid_deaths_nl, aes(x=month, y=deaths))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  labs(title = "Daily covid cases in the Netherlands that occured in 2020",
       x = "Months",
       y = "Cases")+
  theme_minimal()

```
